title: Client Stuck at Updating Interface 32%, can't finish patch
body: My client is stuck multiple times at Updating Interface 32%, the error is "unspecified errors, check logs for more details".  I'd have uploaded the log on here too but I don't know which one is correct. I'd appreciate it if anyone can give me a solution. Thanks in advance.

replies.body:
Hey there. I've gotten this issue too. The easiest solution is to just reinstall League, but that sucks and takes too long. Here's what I do:

Step 1) Open windows explorer.

Step 2) Navigate to "C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects\lol_air_client\releases\"

Step 3) Create a new, empty file in the latest version folder named "S_OK", with no extension. Restart League with admin privileges.

It should scan for the files and then continue downloading the rest of the patch. Also, if you set a custom volume for League, then it will reset. Not inside League itself, though.

If you need any help with it, just ask.

Best of luck.
I know this is pretty late reply but I'm having the same issue and can you tell me how to create an "empty file" I really have no idea!
